thread.title: Bradley Cooper would 'never' sleep with Jennifer Lawrence
thread.title_full: Bradley Cooper would 'never' sleep with Jennifer Lawrence - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bradley Cooper would 'never' sleep with Jennifer Lawrence
text:
Actor Bradley Cooper says despite getting close to Jennifer Lawrence while working on three films together including "American Hustle", the two have maintained a platonic relationship.
READ : Bradley Cooper struggled with 'Elephant Man' weightloss
In an interview on The Howard Stern Show on Wednesday, the Burnt actor assured the host that their relationship is not sexual, reports people.com.
When Stern asked Cooper, 40, if the two were ever going to sleep together, he replied: "Never."
Stern also asked if Lawrence's age (25) had anything to do with it - as Cooper had previously stated - but he clarified that their 15-year age gap wasn't an issue.
"I said that once on a red carpet just as a diffuse thing and then it became a thing because the girl I was seeing (Suki Waterhouse) was as young as she was," he explained.
Instead, the reason is simple - they are simply friends.
"It just didn't happen," he said. "It's not the way we are together."
